passage_text: Lani is a very prominent first name for females (#1845 out of 4276, Top 43%) and also a very prominent last name for all people (#60706 out of 150436, Top 40%). (2000 U.S. Census). Shown below is a comparison of the usage of the girl name Lani and corresponding names.

Personal experiences with the name Lani: | Edit. Surf's Up the movie and My Nickname. My middle name is Nohalani so people often call me Lani. I love it! It's spunky, original and breezy. I love the meaning and Hawaiian association. ------.

Hawaiian Meaning: The name Lani is a Hawaiian baby name. In Hawaiian the meaning of the name Lani is: Sky. American Meaning: The name Lani is an American baby name. In American the meaning of the name Lani is: Sky. SoulUrge Number: 1. Expression Number: 9. People with this name have a deep inner desire to use their abilities in leadership, and to have personal independence.

[ 2 syll. la-ni, lan-i ] The baby girl name Lani is also used as a boy name, though the use for girls is far more popular. It is pronounced as L AA-Niy- †. Lani's language of origin is Hawaiian. It is predominantly used in Hawaiian and English. It is derived literally from the word lani with the meaning 'heaven, sky'.
Lani /lani/ [2 sylls.] as a girls' name is pronounced LAH-nee. It is of Hawaiian origin, and the meaning of Lani is sky.
